message: Abbe's place was so wonderful and just what I needed. It was perfect escape with a great wood stove, beautiful views, horses, and nearby skiing. I'm so greatful.
The location was very quiet and peaceful. We loved the wood stove and the location was convenient, however the interior was not in the best shape
Overall a decent stay. I appreciated having a kitchen and access to firewood for the stove which heated up the little cabin very effectively
Abbes's tiny house was a perfect spot to spend the weekend while skiing in the Tetons. The space was comforatable and the wood stove kept us very warm
